synopsis.text: Takes place during the events of Mirai Fukuin: Mobius Ring, Mikiya Kokutou entrusts his cat to Shiki Ryougi, leaving her to navigate the challenges of caring for a feline friend. In the aftermath of the Fujou building incident, a student named Ririsu Miyazuki grapples with the tragic suicide of her close friend. When Miyazuki contemplates ending her own life, she crosses paths with her classmate, Fujino Asagami, who possesses psychic abilities and helps Miyazuki find a new outlook on life. Following the events of Paradox Paradigm, Mikiya chooses to spend Christmas with Shiki, causing his sister Azaka to spend the holiday with her friends and reflect on what truly matters in life. As New Year's approaches, Mikiya hopes for nothing more than Shiki's happiness. Finally, in Say Grace, Shiki and Mikiya visit a temple together.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
